description: Two separate tests [nova/tests/unit/scheduler/test_filters_utils.py] and [nova/tests/unit/scheduler/filters/test_utils.py] appear to be testing methods of the same file [nova/scheduler/filters/utils.py] in a very similar fashion. They should be consolidated.
title: nova.scheduler.filters.utils is tested in two separate files

comments.content:

Branch:    master

commit 2a1c595358f955f11c1b39f3370fd190ca0a6381
Author: Ming Yang <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Jun 10 11:42:30 2015 -0700

    Consolidates scheduler utils tests into a single file.
    
    Two separate test files [nova/tests/unit/scheduler/test_filters_utils.py] and
    [nova/tests/unit/scheduler/filters/test_utils.py] appear to be testing methods
    from the same module nova.scheduler.filters.utils in a very similar fashion.
    
    Additional cleanup:
    * Removed superfluous directory [nova/tests/unit/functional]
    
    Change-Id: I4ac41cea3ab3d95a11aca80a469aca516bf44e52
    Closes-Bug: #1463918
